alert.note: Alert for Sagadahoc (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 23 at 11:04AM EST until December 25 at 4:24AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Gray ME has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Maine... Kennebec River At Skowhegan affecting Somerset and Kennebec Counties. Kennebec River At North Sidney affecting Kennebec County. Kennebec River At Augusta affecting Kennebec County. Kennebec River at Hallowell affecting Sagadahoc and Kennebec Counties. For the Kennebec River...including Skowhegan, North Sidney, Augusta, Hallowell...Minor up to Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kennebec River at Hallowell. * WHEN...From late tonight to early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Parking lots along Front Street begin to flood. Town dock begins to flood. At 13.0 feet, Water enters the back side of buildings along Water Street. Front Street becomes completely submerged. The parking lot by town dock flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:50 AM EST Friday the stage was 4.1 feet. - Forecast...The river will begin rising late this morning. It will then rise to 7.2 feet this afternoon. It will then rise above flood stage late tonight to 13.7 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
